Name: Knockdown the Ball Twice
About the game: Play as a ball; roll, speed up and jump! Choose the places wisely! - Get rid of obstacles with different strengths. - Choose the boost type at the end of each level. - Enjoy with different looks. - Reach the highest scores. - Complete as soon as you can and collect the stars! Pass the moving obstacles wisely, move on the ground without falling down, stop your time when you are about to fall, collect points and skins, finish the level. New maps, skins and enhancements are on the way!
